about_the_game:
Sherlockian Circle is a community for dedicated gamers to delve deep into intricate levels, solve challenging puzzles, and analyze captivating storylines. Gamer's Haven is your go-to destination for all things Sun Meqi Mystery 2024 and other exciting titles from QZQ Studio. Please note that Sun Meqi Mystery 2024 is released in episodes, meaning the full game is not available immediately upon purchase. New episodes are typically released once a month.

Revenge is human nature, but it often brings more pain and destruction.

Continue to delve into the 1990s of Hepingli as Liu Qingchun, and under the mysterious threat of Lang Yun and Wen San, uncover the ultimate mystery of human nature.

Time is a long river, we can only go with the flow, but we cannot go against it, and it will eventually reveal everything.

Truth? It's right there, within your grasp. Don't you see it coming? What a pity, every time you reach out to grab it, it dissipates like smoke. How ridiculous! You think you can unravel the mystery with your intelligence? Pathetic and laughable! Your so-called strong will is merely a struggle against your own shadow. Look at you struggling along the way, just like those clowns who try to change their fate. In the end, no matter how you struggle, you can't escape being toyed with by the truth! --WenSanRen

The case is still unfolding. Upon entering the Chemical Bureau dormitory, Liu Qingchun inexplicably felt a strange sense of unease, as if something unseen was lurking around him. In the ensuing exploration, he would confront the dual impact of reality and illusion.

Wen Sanren and Wang Zhiqiang have vanished without a trace, while Li Shufu and Liu Yanhong are also missing. And the woman named "Bai Lian" - who was supposed to have died years ago - has reappeared like a ghost in this place, seemingly hinting at something. The case is far more complex than it appears, and there seems to be a more horrifying truth lurking beneath the surface.

Having ventured into the Chemical Bureau dormitory alone, can Liu Qingchun unravel this mystery, or will he become a victim of unknown forces? The truth is about to be revealed.

The case took an unexpected turn when another murder occurred, complicating what had seemed like a simple incident.

With the mysterious Wen Sanren involved, the case became even more convoluted. The disappearances of Li Shufu and Li Bai Si added a layer of fog, drawing Liu Qingchun deeper into a dark abyss.

Continuing his search for clues in the Chemical Bureau dormitory, he proceeded cautiously, leaving no stone unturned. With the assistance of the 403 Intelligence Department, he began to uncover the secrets hidden beneath the everyday lives of each person involved. Through on-site investigations and calm reasoning, he gradually peeled back the layers of their inner "underworlds."

The battle between justice and evil will continue on this invisible battlefield until the truth is revealed.

Hado: Report!

Liu Qingchun: Come in, what is it?

Hado: There's a case in Pingheli East Street that meets the 403 criteria. It has entered the approval process.

Liu Qingchun: What kind of case?

Hado: A man, armed with a knife, injured three people and killed a neighboring girl. The symptoms are the same as Wang Aiguo's back then, a loss of self-control.

Liu Qingchun: Right, have you found anything according to the bamboo slips and the location of the Phoenix Chamber?

Hado: Yes, I've handed it over to the 403 Intelligence Department. It's a "compass."

Liu Qingchun: I'll take this case personally.

Update Schedule

Chapter 4: Estimated update in January 2025

Chapter 5: Estimated update in February 2025

Chapter 6: Estimated update in March 2025

About the Game

MeiQi 2024 is a narrative puzzle game, the latest installment in the MeiQi series.
Liu Qingchun, as the bureau chief, personally investigates the cases of the 403 Intelligence Division.
There are 6 different cases in this season for you to solve.
You can freely switch between first-person and third-person perspectives.

Due to being developed by a single person, guidance is relatively weak.
This work contains a lot of reasoning, puzzles, and some horror elements.

Developed by a Single Independent Developer

Hello everyone, my name is Q叔. Welcome to the world of puzzle games from QZQ Studio. MeiQi 2024 is the newest work in the MeiQi universe. I am a passionate solo game developer who has been developing suspense puzzle games. Previous works include the "Meiqi Mystery" series and the "Lin Shanhai Detective Collection" series. I really enjoy what I do now, and I will be active on social media and in groups. You can find me on Bilibili/Xiaohongshu/Douyin/QQ group. Feel free to contact me.

MeiQiSeries

The MeiQi Series includes all works from 2019 to 2024.

Abnormal 1999 Series

The Abnormal 1999 series is a spin-off of the Sun Meiqi universe, telling the story and adventures of SU.

They are "Silence", "Killer Apartment", "SU", "Hyperspace", "Area 49", and "The Compass and the Sand".

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains some mild horror elements and adult themes. While there are tension-building sequences meant to be unnerving, the game does not depict excessive graphic violence or gore.

The storyline explores mature subject matter, including supernatural occurrences and disturbing situations. However, it does not contain any explicit sexual content. There are references to alcohol and drug use in certain contexts.

Potentially unsettling topics such as death, mental instability, and psychological trauma are present, but they are portrayed respectfully without gratuitous detail. There may be some jump scares and creepy imagery/environments.

Overall, the game maintains a suspenseful and eerie tone rather than relying on shocking visceral content. However, parental guidance is still recommended for younger audiences due to the game's mature thematic elements and unsettling horror overtones throughout the experience.

name: MeiQi 2024

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2100 @ 3.10 GHz/ AMD FX-4100 @ 3.60 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Meiqi 2024 is a narrative puzzle game and the latest installment in the MeiQi series. Liu Qingchun, the bureau chief, personally takes charge of investigating the cases of the 403 Intelligence Division. This season presents you with six unique cases to solve.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
